document.title: Faith Formation (Religion) Curriculum Framework Standards and Benchmarks: Grade 3

C91DDCF260E546D29E9AC17EC8305198.description: Students will know that all creation is sacred.

A7DD028CEAE84D5F8D7BCB68F70C3FCA.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the importance of care for God’s creation.

91CEEC0CA4DB4F71B47B5C4F62C96D60.description: Students will know what actions can cause division among their family and neighbors.

49B513D8211F4D85886C658E6E3A5BCF.description: Students will grow in their understanding of solidarity.

B8A28BF9FD0C414FA453E70205079385.description: Students will know that they are responsible to help with work in their homes and Church.

ADDF8BDD5D7740DABC9C4D2B62AD9D45.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the dignity of the work and the rights of others.

7182B727AA9D4B38B17DBA204B8D341E.description: Students will know some ways to help the poor in their midst.

C8B8EE9809754C9791A13B2D5BE8D26F.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the preferential option for the poor and vulnerable.

B8625B2A8D4045CD98EEFB3F03A0F3E2.description: Students will know that they are responsible for one another.

839F83941B5641CAB546B1BFDE3BB1C2.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the rights of all people and their responsibilities towards others.

B5A5D3AE844044F1B2DC165543436448.description: Students will know how to name at least one example of how they participate in family, community and society.

BC7C54BC37054EB5B72B663B7AAE1A35.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the call to family, community and participation in society.

5A5200F9229E4BCCBA9D1563D1EC5E18.description: Students will know that we should respect all life.

7F2E110DF9FA4F03828ECFFF155BED34.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the life and dignity of the human person.

7DC5E02435484D0088FCCC59FC2EB848.description: Students will know how to relate justice and service to practical examples in their lives.

7A3BA2E6D0AC4E46BFD1A96BC03AB80C.description: Students will know the meaning of the words justice and service.

126A721E789541B1B00C02F1500C9EA0.description: Students will grow in their understanding of justice and service.

8518C1C54F1C43AEBAC6728A7C87E5B2.description: Students will know that their choices also affect others.

8CE9A7F16AB44646862679FEF80DBCAE.description: Students will know to respect all forms of life.

62E44147F4E642CFA84679D7C3DA5535.description: Students will grow in their knowledge of Catholic social teaching.

D5961001DFBF4A87B65D06682E0FEE67.description: Students will know the various liturgical ministries.

CD0E938CE3E14BC6A9F74AE78B22374E.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the ministry of the Church.

1EEC8D1CFC4B47F79824B000B4A719C4.description: Students will know that the Pope is the pastor of the entire Church.

94077F2865DB4687A96563B8B5763020.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Church life at parish, diocesan and universal levels.

ACDCE33E086148E6A195020708EF25FC.description: Students will know that Jesus wants them to always grow in their faith.

38F97B9024884B818422EF52E75EAEED.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in life-long faith formation.

4143EF10CC514F06B5CB6E18C1C77F52.description: Students will know the importance of being members of the liturgical assembly.

EA72953D64A4457D97899A4CB0C32A04.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the liturgical life of the Church.

8AF799ABD5FF4F66844568BBD6ECECDB.description: Students will know that the Church has laws [precepts] that give us rules for living the Christian life.

D2831422E2694FA9AAD706213B363815.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church Law.

501D0A92BA0B4E659133C1E19C10EC4E.description: Students will know that if we confess our sins God will forgive us.

4A2379BFA506492388264AD7CA08CB68.description: Students will know the meaning of sin according to the age and ability: venial, mortal, personal, social.

E5B21B82DA23483689F64A2F31B70026.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Sin and Forgiveness.

5E873D7098894A469E59BC1EDC4E6352.description: Students will know the meaning of God’s mercy.

1F8545A70B304F35B59E0094F0789F33.description: Students will know that in Jesus Christ we receive the grace that restores what sin has damaged in us.

F9EBCF9739974D549F208B9AD6D11C13.description: Students will know how to do an examination of conscience.

DDEDDE04E284466F8C625023EC0BA79A.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Conscience.

5161CBE022DA4832B1C86E17795A703D.description: Students will know that we are to be good stewards of the world.

46246484F61F41339CE8F22635E11017.description: Students will know that marriage is a covenant not to be broken.

7D75EA8C37624513850B122BEA817D58.description: Students will know that every human life is sacred and created in God’s image.

9D4D5F44AFF2499B81D279CD504D678A.description: Students will know that the family is called the ‘domestic church’.

6A1CD0FF5AF54BD1AED8632456EF8578.description: Students will know that Sunday is the Lord’s Day, the day every Catholic gathers to celebrate the Eucharist.

8A7D7DDCC24F43C48398DB165E7D465C.description: Students will know that God calls each one by name and everyone’s name is sacred.

A04F31A7D371468099FBB1FF1C7BC66B.description: Students will know that Jesus gave us two great commandments: the love of God and love of neighbor.

340E51566E994D61A52696C0E57EC1B4.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Commandments.

DE3D92E06FC5481289EE098052D496B3.description: Students will know the great commandment to love God and our neighbor.

91B3C1A6D4144B7E9AD42D491A13534A.description: Students will know the beatitudes and how they are a model for how we live.

81C8F1EAF11C445BA4A3F855BCB9F0B3.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Beatitudes.

1800299AE1CE4E34BFE4213E1ED69B27.description: Students will know that the mutual love of the Father, Son and Holy Spirit is the model for harmony among human persons.

FBA60639191745AA8B3976EEE97F5EEB.description: Students will know that all of us sin, but if we confess our sins God will forgive us.

9F0B20AD979C425E9D938435F6FFD8B2.description: Students will know that virtue is a habitual and firm disposition to do good.

7615D72699E04E31BD446E1AE0DE0115.description: Students will know that through his grace, God offers us the gift of eternal life.

CA4ADD0F32424E649B5052AEDEB2ADCF.description: Students will know that in Jesus Christ we receive the grace that restores what sin has damaged in us.

1F13779A68744E6E817EC47DEAD3F13C.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Life in Christ.

44BB071AC30347ED99301902FEBC936C.description: Students will know the Hail Mary, Apostles Creed, and the Rosary.

18C2CAB4AEAA405AB90C2B3928E2E611.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit prays in us and teaches us how to pray.

3EE282C77B244C4591AA7C4CDA6C9E3F.description: Students will understand that Christians pray always.

B5D64930DB1F45238A309324232DFEF0.description: Students will understand the prayer of petition.

58B9A899F87A41768858C28A94D8F175.description: Students will know that God’s creation can help us to pray.

F7795EB9F144428DB9FD0D7123AF31A3.description: Students will grow in their understanding of prayer.

1DC823B005554B6098F938FB17870B9B.description: Students will participate in non-sacramental penitential services in order to lead them to regularly celebrate the Rite of Reconciliation.

AA0D2A998835433088B72959868412D3.description: Students will know more of the many blessings of the Church.

CAC1ED138CF04CB5A8DCEFC7ACE22414.description: Students will know that lay people can give blessings.

AB8358198B7644578FEE6F80533FC8E8.description: Students will know how to pray a Celebration of the Word.

866D529A95734FDBA6B936C3C6952CD2.description: Students will know how to prayer morning and evening prayer.

28B995D223434F4DB209C1039A8865D1.description: Students will grow in their understanding of other Liturgical celebrations.

B949E28ED11949BCBB18B3E57C90696F.description: Students will know the different traditional symbols of each season.

C78DAA63538C47A3B20C5817A4C94253.description: Students will know the meaning of the Easter season.

E7DBCC86440647A4A521DD03A57DB897.description: Students will know that each season celebrates various aspects of the Paschal Mystery.

01A819F7588A4710AA18D234A7A1F45D.description: Students will know that the liturgical year has many different seasons.

93E4FBD7026E4355991054520E23ADA2.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Liturgical Year.

3EFEBDDBCD584544B1A4110DFAACDE56.description: Students will know that God is the author of marriage.

A4462A54905544A9B930E2AAE2672DE4.description: Students will know that Holy Orders have three degrees: bishop, priest, and deacon.

E5E442721D2244CBA250145980025064.description: Students will know that the Anointing of the Sick shows the Church’s care for the sick.

DDBB85F4AD024B29A893E68514F60F49.description: Students will know the many names of the Sacrament of Reconciliation: confession, penance, conversion.

F457BADBD6BC462CA6FB300C85408BC7.description: Students will know the primary symbols and gestures of baptism: Cross, oil, water, light, white garment, immersion, laying on of hands.

1F065D3E1CEC4BC9BE78BFDE0705B92A.description: Students will know that the sacraments require faith and build up our faith.

5C2E1BF336F540EE86A8B367C1BD227F.description: Students will know that the sacraments are true encounters with Jesus Christ.

5E18B9BAA2F84E888094557D69067938.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Sacraments.

BA917DFEA3AB4C59B550A5CDA6B96EFD.description: Students will know that we adore Christ by making visits to the Blessed Sacrament.

306330C11DAA437E856D4419005AA07E.description: Students will know that in the Mass we share in Christ’s prayer to the Father in the Holy Spirit.

6A6D6C36E7A5470EB35B5F3603C88855.description: Students will know a deeper familiarity with the dominant symbols and gestures of the liturgy.

7D2E45B950264BA584645010FA07A8A3.description: Students will know that to be Catholic is to give worship and praise to God every Sunday.

849FA41E442C4F578FD2352225F519A7.description: Students will know that they must continue to participate fully in every part of the Mass.

3F471360710F41D6A1A2CCB75126BD85.description: Students will know that the celebration of the Eucharist is the center of the Church’s life.

0E669AB363694DFD8E5B068FF5B6434D.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Worship and prayer.

189403AF0C2C4935B652EB788856F4E5.description: Students will know that the Church honors saints, and especially Mary, for their holiness.

E82DEBEC9EC5495E9C05EEFC140C0654.description: Students will know the meaning of the “Communion of Saints.”

F7435A487B8941D58FAEED8C6BFD5DB6.description: Students will know that Mary is the perfect model of faith.

324DDA94E751460282CF1FF84B4B0A46.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Saints.

F999FEAF48404BD9A6B9BC8D35317AEE.description: Students will know that Mary is preceded by holy women in the Old Testament.

EC0A0BA39EE3491BBA0AE875BF80D842.description: Students will know that the Bible is the Word of God written in human words.

54489E7B7E8244ABB783DC6ADF31BBA8.description: Students will know that God speaks to us in his Church and in the Bible.

C32FBE684B9F4CBA90830A83FB2F802E.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Revelation.

DA50B320AFD441729D4C9502687CFDE9.description: Students will know that we become members of the Church by faith in Christ and Baptism.

92191D8CDD004300B4DCF57FC9112FA1.description: Students will know that God calls all people to salvation.

FBD6980CEC6845B290789A9C7D861F45.description: Students will know that the Church is the Communion of Saints.

EC6371CB3CDE4B0A81A6CAE59B84D02A.description: Students will know that the Church is the Body of Christ.

08F0B1F31FF04D8F96945D951038329B.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church.

DA4E3821F0254BBA8A4675842957FBF9.description: Students will know that by the action of the Holy Spirit in Mary, the Father gives the world Emmanuel, ‘God with us.’

73E4B5C606AC4DB9901DAF55481117A5.description: Students will know that we live and walk by the Spirit.

0B6EF0B7FECD47608A5F25EFAC388E86.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit is the third person of the Trinity worshiped with the Father and the Son.

C4990B4AA5EE4291964DAF48A280360D.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Holy Spirit.

E763C020F1D248E79DECAE8B8055C13B.description: Students will know that Jesus died for everyone.

C79CC1025CB84DE5B2417CDAA0D02363.description: Students will know the meaning of the Ascension.

15CBD8582CC648DD84E26B34876D6C74.description: Students will know that the Paschal Mystery is the death and resurrection of Jesus.

BAA1AC7540154F4597672B11B6DE5C66.description: Students will know that Christ is the greatest sign of God’s love for us.

192000420550401C8404E98E6468DC4D.description: Students will know that the Word became flesh to save us from our sins.

3D1205A52CA047CFBAC5DFE94E3847C7.description: Students will know that the Good News is that God sent his beloved Son into the world.

654E54E7A5FA4FC2BB968298DD4F8CEA.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Son.

DC46E6231CF14F69BA5DCF442E01CA30.description: Students will know that creation reflects the beauty of the Creator.

5359B95016AA4E8DB8D0C783B8027858.description: Students will know that God is present in everything he has made.

350F1447758A489DAF7CA789D47BC081.description: Students will know that God is holy and everlasting.

D7EF2301C97C4A8581054DCC89A97D96.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Father.

BE14D5F3C7C242A8A07D6A1E54448D9B.description: Students will know that grace is participation in the life of the Trinity.

465487C60111410F8C6B665BCE3FA230.description: Students will know that the Creed speaks of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.

06A4E1BA800F44158EA8F0C6DC66F4C3.description: Students will know that God speaks to us about Himself by sending his beloved Son.

897CB990841F4BC5A8954D2C80817744.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Triune God.
